adguard.name: AdGuard
adguard.description: AdGuard offers apps for Android, iOS, Windows, and Mac. With them, you can block ads in browsers and apps, prevent websites and companies from tracking you, and protect yourself from phishing and malware.

akamai.name: Akamai Technologies
akamai.description: Akamai is a cloud based content delivery network. They offer application performance services, solutions for digital media and software distribution and storage, online advertising services and other specialized/ Internet-based offerings.

apple.name: Apple
apple.description: Apple is an American multinational corporation that designs and markets consumer electronics, computer software, and personal computers.

facebook.name: Facebook
facebook.description: Facebook is an online social network accessible to anyone with an active email address. People use Facebook to keep up with friends, upload photos, share links and videos, and learn more about the people they meet.

verizon.name: Verizon
verizon.description: Verizon (short for Verizon Communications Inc.), is an American multinational telecommunications conglomerate and a corporate component of the Dow Jones Industrial Average. In 2015, Verizon expanded its business into content ownership by acquiring AOL, and two years later it acquired Yahoo!. AOL and Yahoo were amalgamated into a new division named Oath Inc.

google.name: Google
google.description: Google LLC is an American multinational technology company that specializes in Internet-related services and products, which include online advertising technologies, search engine, cloud computing, software, and hardware.

appsflyer.name: AppsFlyer
appsflyer.description: AppsFlyer is the global leading platform for Mobile Attribution & Marketing Analytics.

yandex.name: Yandex
yandex.description: Yandex is a Russian search engine and Internet services firm. They also offer a variety of other online services including: news, weather, traffic, maps, personal email, and a web analytics platform. Yandex also operates an ad network.

adjust.name: Adjust GmbH
adjust.description: Adjust is the industry leader in mobile measurement and fraud prevention.

branch_metrics_inc.name: Branch Metrics
branch_metrics_inc.description: Branch provides free deep linking technology for mobile app developers to gain and retain users. We're on a mission to help solve mobile discovery by connecting users to relevant app content through deep links.

lets_encrypt.name: Let's Encrypt
lets_encrypt.description: Let's Encrypt is a non-profit certificate authority run by Internet Security Research Group that provides X.509 certificates for Transport Layer Security encryption at no charge.

markmonitor.name: MarkMonitor
markmonitor.description: \"When the world's leading brands rely on you to protect their revenue and reputation in the digital world, you develop powerful insights and unrivalled methodologies to help combat sophisticated, evolving online threats. MarkMonitor clients look to our unique combination of industry-leading expertise, advanced technologies and extensive industry relationships to preserve marketing investments, revenues and customer trust.\"

microsoft.name: Microsoft
microsoft.description: Microsoft is an American multinational corporation that develops, manufactures, licenses, supports, and sells a range of software products and services.

telstra.name: Telstra
telstra.description: Telstra is Australia's leading telecommunications and technology company, offering a full range of communications services and competing in all telecommunications markets.

oztam.name: OzTAM
oztam.description: OzTAM is the official source of television audience measurement (TAM) covering Australiaâ€™s five mainland metropolitan markets and nationally for subscription television.

oppo.name: OPPO
oppo.description: OPPO is a Chinese consumer electronics and mobile communications company.

kik.name: Kik
kik.description: Kik Messenger, commonly called Kik, is a freeware instant messaging mobile app from the Canadian company Kik Interactive, available on iOS and Android operating systems.

matrix.name: Matrix
matrix.description: Matrix is an open source project that publishes the Matrix open standard for secure, decentralised, real-time communication, and its Apache licensed reference implementations.

qualcomm.name: Qualcomm
qualcomm.description: Qualcomm is an American multinational corporation that creates semiconductors, software, and services related to wireless technology.

solaredge.name: SolarEdge Technologies, Inc.
solaredge.description: SolarEdge offers optimizers, inverters, monitoring equipment, tools, and accessories for power harvesting, conversion, and efficiency.

sectigo.name: Sectigo Limited
sectigo.description: Sectigo is a leading cybersecurity provider of digital identity solutions, including TLS / SSL certificates, DevOps, IoT, and enterprise-grade PKI management, as well as multi-layered web security.

netflix.name: Netflix
netflix.description: Netflix is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of award-winning TV shows, movies, anime, documentaries, and more on thousands of internet-connected devices.

reddit.name: Reddit, Inc.
reddit.description: \"reddit is a source for what's new and popular on the web. Users like you provide all of the content and decide, through voting, what's good and what's junk.\"

vk.name: VK
vk.description: VK is a Russian technology company. It started in 1998 as an e-mail service and went on to become a major corporate figure in the Russian-speaking segment of the Internet.

snap_technologies.name: Snap Inc.
snap_technologies.description:
Snap Inc. is a camera company.

We believe that reinventing the camera represents our greatest opportunity to improve the way people live and communicate.
Our products empower people to express themselves, live in the moment, learn about the world, and have fun together.

showrss.name: showRSS
showrss.description: showRSS is an internet tool that lets you keep track of your favorite TV shows.

element.name: Element
element.description: Element is a Matrix-based end-to-end encrypted messenger and secure collaboration app.

ntppool.name: Network Time Protocol
ntppool.description: Network Time Protocol a public benefit organization, develops, produces and maintains the most widely-used open-source precision time software.

medialab.name: MediaLab.AI Inc.
medialab.description: MediaLab is a media & technology company focused on acquiring and growing properties and global brands.
